availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Dalton (Lawrence County, farm hand and soldier)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, farm hand and soldier. Virginia native. Son of William Dalton and Maria Dalton. Married to Barbary Dalton. Father of William H. Dalton. Resident in Logan County, Virginia in 1850. Farm hand in Lawrence County in 1860. Served in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia as first lieutenant from May 21, 1864 to June 21, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Logan County, District 32, p. 129A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 170.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Precinct 7, p. 10.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 896.
